name: Smooch translation processor
description: Translate incoming user messages into the language of your choice

LANGUAGE_CODE.description: An ISO 639-1 language code for the target language

YANDEX_API_KEY.description: API key for Yandex translation API

SMOOCH_KEY_ID.description: Smooch app level secret key ID

SERVICE_URL.description: The full base URL of this application. For example, if you name the application "evil-turtle" the base url should be "https://evil-turtle.herokuapp.com"
